name: Farming Life
description:
Use relaxing graphics and feel like farmer.

Manage your farm. Employ people to work.

Take care of the animals: Bulls, Cats, Chickens, Cows, Dogs, Goats, Gooses, Horses, Pigs, Ostriches, Pigeons, Rabbits, Sheeps.

Grow the farm for Bird Houses, Feeders, Granaries, Hen Houses, Farm Village Houses, Privies, Sheds, Silos, Stables, Warehouses, Watering Pipes, Water Towers, Wells, Windmills, Wood Sheds.

Grow Apples, Beetroots, Cabbages, Carrots, Corns, Leeks, Onions, Pepper, Pumpkins, Sunflowers, Tomatoes, Wheat.

Spend your money on the development of the farm.

Take part in a chill out game!
